message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SY, cs.SN, cs.IT

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper deals with tracking infection diffusion in social networks, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
2. cs.SD (Software Engineering) - The paper involves the development and implementation of filtering algorithms for tracking infection diffusion, which can be considered as a software engineering problem.
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper deals with modeling and controlling the spread of infection in social networks, which can be considered as a systems and control problem.
4. cs.SN (Social Networking and Virtual Communities) - The paper deals with analyzing and modeling information diffusion in social networks, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
5. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper involves the estimation of infected degree distribution using Bayesian filtering, which can be considered as an information theory problem.
